title: Mathematical Crossword

headings.text: I am unable to open the game. How can I fix this?

controls: Drag numbers and symbols with the mouse.Click on an empty cell and then on the number or symbol to place it.
Drag numbers and symbols with your finger.Tap an empty cell to highlight it, then tap the number or symbol to place it.
content.howToPlay: Fill in the empty boxes on the grid with numbers and arithmetic symbols given below your screen.Drag numbers and symbols. You can also click on an empty cell and select the number or symbol below.Feel free to swap numbers and symbols as needed.You must fill all the squares to complete a puzzle.Remember, calculations are from left to right and from top to bottom.As you fill up all empty spaces, the game will automatically check your answers for you.

fullContent: Home› MathMathematical CrosswordBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenReady to give a twist to regular crossword? Play it with numbers and signs! Mathematical Crossword is an online game that challenges you to place numbers and arithmetic symbols on a crossword grid.Randomly generated puzzles offers infinite amount of levels. Set the difficulty based on your grade and decide whether to include arithmetic symbols or not.Get ready to challenge your math skills with Mathematical Crossword!ControlsComputers:Drag numbers and symbols with the mouse.Click on an empty cell and then on the number or symbol to place it.Mobiles:Drag numbers and symbols with your finger.Tap an empty cell to highlight it, then tap the number or symbol to place it.How to Play Mathematical CrosswordFill in the empty boxes on the grid with numbers and arithmetic symbols given below your screen.Drag numbers and symbols. You can also click on an empty cell and select the number or symbol below.Feel free to swap numbers and symbols as needed.You must fill all the squares to complete a puzzle.Remember, calculations are from left to right and from top to bottom.As you fill up all empty spaces, the game will automatically check your answers for you.Hints and HelpersRemove: Remove numbers or symbols from a square by tappping on the basket icon.  Sort: You can also sort numbers and symbols for a tidy screen.Hints: You have 5 hints for each puzzle. Hints will place a random number correctly when used.I am unable to open the game. How can I fix this?One common reason for this issue is the use of an ad blocker, which can make the game unplayable.To resolve this, try disabling the ad blocker in your browser's extensions menu. Then, refresh the page to open the game. If the problem continues, please feel free to visit our support page or leave a comment below.DeveloperGamepush created Mathematical Crossword.More Brain Games OnlineNext, you can play Ancient 2048, a puzzle game where you try to get the highest score by moving tiles with numbers. The goal is to reach 2048.If you'd like to further look your alternatives, look at all the brain games online by following the link.This article was updated on July 17, 20241 Player2DBrainFreeHTML5LogicMathMobilePuzzle
